doc.title: The Prairie Boys
doc.plot: 3 men in their 20's pull off the heist of the ages when they start a drug business that is secretly hidden in the prairie grass of the hood. They figure out how to build a mini submarine to transport and pick-up drugs, then transport them through the sewer systems in the town. Before long, 2 over zealous detectives figure out the operation and shut it down for good but do they really stop them?
